Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory545.jpg'}
{3: 'After an extremely difficult mission, the Parliament approved a few days of holiday for most commandants.'}
{3: "While you don't need to go out, there are still tons of documents accumulated over time for you to process."}
{3: 'There is no such thing as a holiday. Catching up on the paperwork is enough to keep you occupied.'}
{3: 'There is no escape from these repetitious and uneventful days...'}
{2: 'If only there were something special happening...', 3: '8'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Commandant!'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Com—man—dant!'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Commandant, are you here?'}
{3: "Nanami's voice arrives way before she does. Her typical style. But to come here at this point in time..."}
{2: 'Is that considered special?', 3: '13'}
{3: 'After signing the familiar repair report for the door, the energetic Nanami arrives at your desk.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "I knew you'd be here, Commandant!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Nanami is your assistant for the day. Ahem...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Nanami clears her throat.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Nanami reporting! Any order, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Not really.', 3: '24', 4: 'You are my assistant?', 5: '25'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Then you're free to help me with something, Commandant!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'I am now! Because Nanami has a favor to ask you, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Is that what an assistant does? You remain suspicious, but your words are honest—'}
{2: '???', 3: "An analysis of the target human's tone and temperature change indicates the target's level of willingness to continue working is 0.543%."}
{3: 'You hear a strange robotic voice with electrical crackles coming from the corridor. It sounds quite horrifying when it comes out of nowhere.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Haha, isn't it fun, Commandant? That's Nanami's new friend, Maple.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Haha, Commandant, did Maple scare you?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Without gaining your approval, Nanami pulls a large "office chair" inside the room.'}
{2: 'Maple... is a chair?', 3: '41'}
{3: 'Its main structure is an office chair indeed, but it is also connected to various circuits, screens and control panels.'}
{3: 'Dated parts, uneven paint, rust marks...'}
{3: 'It feels like Nanami has dug out the cockpit of some vehicle from a few centuries ago and brought it here.'}
{3: 'When you move closer, you find a green, freaky smiley face flickering on a small CRT screen.'}
{2: "Are you sure this isn't a torturing tool?", 3: '46', 4: 'What is this?', 5: '48'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Of course not!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Precisely speaking, Maple is...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Maple', 3: 'Maple is a truly humanized smart virtual reality chair. Nanami created me to bring you more joy. I hope you will like me.'}
{2: 'Maple', 3: 'Hello, 【kuroname】.'}
{2: 'Maple', 3: 'You do not know me, but Maple knows everything about you.'}
{2: 'Maple', 3: 'I want to play a game.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Maple! Did I let you answer before me?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Maple makes a series of descending electrical sounds. The fluorescent eyes on its screen have also lowered, looking sad and disheartened.'}
{2: 'Maple', 3: 'Bzzzz—Maple is sorry. Maple is a good child. Maple should not interrupt while Nanami is talking.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Ahem... As Maple said, it can help Nanami to recreate all sorts of scenes.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "It's more than just virtual reality. In fact, some of Nanami's wisdom has been lent to Maple!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "That's why Maple can do a lot of things that regular VR devices cannot.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Babylonia is so stingy on resource management. All my applications were rejected.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'It took me a lot of time and effort digging up the junkyard before finally managing to assemble enough computing power for Maple.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Commandant, do you still remember our date?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The topic she suddenly brings up jogs your memories—'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory196.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'First stop, the carousel! Rumor has it that the horses will take you to the sky if you ride them long enough!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory188.png'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Second stop, let's go to the haunted house! ...Though ghosts aren't real at all.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory194.png'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'And the third stop is roller coaster time! Its rail will break halfway. Super exciting, right?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory199.png'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'We never finished any ride, but it was still a super fun day!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Hmph! Relax your stupid fingers!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Oops... It broke.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory545.jpg'}
{3: 'Luckily, she was holding the hand of a mannequin...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "You must've remembered it too, right, Commandant?", 4: '1'}
{2: '(Nod hard in grief)', 3: '95', 4: 'Hard to forget.', 5: '96'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'But that date was nowhere near enough!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Nanami remembers it clearly. But it was still not enough!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Nanami had a great time with you, but somehow I just felt something was missing.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'I thought about it for a long time and finally found out the reason.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'The location!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'I looked up the database. People used to date on beaches, cinemas, or streets. All of them are no longer around.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'So, I built Maple to resolve this particular problem.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I have added many locations where I'd like to have a date with you in Maple. There are a total of... How many?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Maple', 3: 'Report: Nanami has saved a total of 4294967296 locations, 65536 weather effects, and 18446744073709551616 sudden events in Maple.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Huh? Did I save that many?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Alright, let's not waste any time. Come sit here, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Nanami pats on Maple. Its seat squeaks, and you see small electrical sparks on the tangled cables.'}
{3: 'Nanami sounds shocked.'}
{2: "I've still got paperwork to do.", 3: '120', 4: "I don't feel good about this.", 5: '122'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Just put them away for now, Commandant. You hate them, don't you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Don't worry, Maple is absolutely safe. Even if it's not, you still have me!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Pleeease, Commandant—Nanami would love to take this opportunity to know more about you.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Without further explanation, Nanami drags you toward Maple. A human's strength is nowhere near a Construct's, and she presses you onto the seat."}
{3: 'Despite its dilapidated look, Maple is surprisingly comfortable to sit in.'}
{3: 'But the comfort is fleeting as Nanami puts a fully enclosed metal helmet on your head.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'Click!'}
{3: 'The thick metal blocks all the light. You can only feel the smell of rust and stuffy darkness.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Are you ready, Commandant?'}
{3: 'Her voice bounces around inside the metal helmet, making a humming echo that bombards your skull.'}
{3: 'Still, you can clearly feel her eagerness and excitement. Somehow, this has calmed you down.'}
{2: "(It's too late to say no.)", 3: '139'}
{3: 'Accepting your fate, you give a thumbs up toward the direction of her voice.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Beginning to connect!'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I'll see you on the other side, Commandant."}

{3: 'You hear a long beep. The seat under you suddenly thrusts forward, and you cannot tell whether the propulsion is virtual or real. You feel your mind accelerating in a deep sea or space until it crashes into a blazing white light.'}
